sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-alert :icon="icon" :type="type" :dense="dense" text>
    <slot></slot>
  </v-alert>
</template>
<script>
  import { VAlert } from 'vuetify/lib'

  export default {
    components: { VAlert },
    props: {
      success: {
        type: Boolean,
        default: null,
      },
      warning: {
        type: Boolean,
        default: null,
      },
      error: {
        type: Boolean,
        default: null,
      },
      dense: {
        type: Boolean,
        default: null,
      },
    },
    computed: {
      icon() {
        if (this.success) {
          return 'mdi-check-circle'
        }
        if (this.warning) {
          return 'mdi-alert'
        }
        if (this.error) {
          return 'mdi-alert-circle'
        }
        return 'mdi-information'
      },
      type() {
        if (this.success) {
          return 'success'
        }
        if (this.warning) {
          return 'warning'
        }
        if (this.error) {
          return 'error'
        }
        return 'info'
      },
    },
  }
</script>
